General.Name: Top Choice Medical Investment Co Inc
General.Description: Topchoice Medical Corporation provides medical services in China. The company provides various medical services in the areas of oral, reproductive, health, and ophthalmology. It also operates dental medical institutions and hospitals. The company was formerly known as Topchoice Medical Investment Co., Inc. and changed its name to Topchoice Medical Corporation in November 2019. Topchoice Medical Corporation was founded in 1995 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
